properties.definition: Words used to ask questions that involve selecting from a set of options, whether specified or unspecified.
properties.example_sentence: Which model should we use for the test?
solution_rules: which: asking for information specifying one or more people or things from a definite set
whatever: used to emphasize a lack of restriction in referring to any thing or amount
whichever: used to refer to one of a number of things, when it is not important which one
